verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: <] p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry “ ca n’t get over the fact that he had his chance and blew it ” with Iran.</p] >
< p > President Donald Trump says former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry “ [V: ca] n’t get over the fact that he had his chance and blew it ” with Iran.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump says [ARG1: former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry] “ [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: get] [ARG2: over the fact that he had his chance and blew it ”] [ARGM-ADV: with Iran.</p] >
< p > President Donald Trump says former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry “ ca n’t get over the fact that [ARG0: he] [V: had] [ARG1: his chance] and blew it ” with Iran.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump says former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry “ ca n’t get over the fact that [ARG0: he] had his chance and [V: blew] [ARG1: it] ” with Iran.</p >
